content: THIS is what _every_ bank should provide. I was thinking about it the other day and the only reason I could find is that it could lead to companies writing their own internet banking and selling it to regular people and then doing some “undesired” transaction, but that is so easily fixable… like, read-only tokens, maybe even a proper TOS to avoid such companies. Anyways, I’m glad to see there’s something in this direction. Missing now is scheduling time with doctors via REST.
